casebody.data:
Donald Earl WHITAKER and Thomas Lee Whitaker, Jr., Co-Administrators of the Estate of Carlton Whitaker, Deceased
v.
TOWN OF SCOTLAND NECK, C.T. Hasty, Individually and in his official capacity as Safety Director of the Town of Scotland Neck, and Douglas Braddy, Individually and in his official capacity as Public Works Superintendent for the Town of Scotland Neck. No. 49PA03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2004. Patrick H. Flanagan, Charlotte, Donna R. Rascoe, Edward C. LeCarpentier, III, David H. Batten, Raleigh, for Town of Scotland Neck, et al. Frank D. Lawrence, for Whitakers.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiffs on the 11th day of December 2003 for rehearing of the decision of this Court pursuant to Rule 31, N.C. Rules of Appellate Procedure, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of February 2004."
